title: No season reward?
body:
All my friends have gotten their rewards, and I remain as the only one between us who haven't gotten anything :-(
I don't have any bans or suspensions, so I should be eligible, i think!

I'm not sure if the servers are just slow, but it seems odd for me to be the only one without the new skin and border!
I'm so proud to have climbed to dia, and it's a bit disheartening to see my hard work replaced with a gold border{{sticker:sg-soraka}}

replies.body: Those rewards are still going out and haven't quite made it to everyone yet. If you still don't see yours after a few days, be sure to shoot a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) our way!
